Introduction to convolutional codes and Reed-Solomon codes5. Architecture and parameters of DVB-T systems6. Introduction to channel coding of DVB-T systems7. Software implementation of DVB-T channel demodulation and decoding8. Introduction to Transport Stream (TS)9. Introduction to video coding10. Introduction to audio coding

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 人類賴以維生的地球自然資源日益匱乏，如何減少生態資源的消耗，同時增加經濟生產效率，乃是世界各國在追求永續發展的過程中所共同面臨的問題與挑戰。生態效益主要在於探討如何提昇資源利用效率，降低污染壓力，改善環境績效。「生態效益與永續發展」課程規劃為三學分，授課內容將涵蓋生態效益與經濟發展、生態效益與環境績效、生態效益的定義與評量、如何落實生態效益、生態效益伙伴關係、企業角色功能、案例研究等。
description.en: The natural resources,of which human being is heavily depending upon,are becoming scarcer as time goes by. How to reduce the depletion of natural resources while to increase the efficiency of economic production is the common problem and challenge for every countries in the world to encounter in pursuing sustainable development.Eco-efficiency is mainly to address the way to raise the efficiency of resources utilization,to reduce pollution stress, and to improve environmental performance. "Eco-efficiency and sustainable development"is designed as a 3-hour course. The content of this course will cover the following issues,including Eco-efficiency and economic development, Eco-efficiency and environmental performance, definition and assessment of Eco-efficiency, implementation of Eco-efficiency,Eco-efficiency partership,role and function of business,and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括：環境控制系統及分析、程序工程、系統動力學、及環境控制系統設計。
description.en: Analysis and design of process control systems in environmental engineering applications including process dynamics, instrumentation, and control system

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 1.固體晶體結構2.原子與電子3.在熱平衡狀態下之能帶與載子濃度4.載子傳輸現像5. p-n接面6.?極性電晶體及相關元件特性7.金氧半導體場效電晶體8.金屬半導體場效電晶體9.光電元件
description.en: 1. The Crystal Structure of Solids2. Atoms and Electrons3. Energy Bands and Carrier Concentration in Thermal Equilibrium4. Carrier Transport Phenomena5. p-n junction6. Bipolar Transistor and Related Devices7. MOSFET and Related Devices8. MESFET and Related Devices9. Photonic Devices

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)基礎量子力學，(2)古典固態理論，(3)晶格結構與x-ray繞射，(4)電子結構理論，(5)表面效應，(6)半導體特性專論。
description.en: The following topics will be presented in this course: (1) basic quantum theory, (2)classical solidstate theory, (3)Crystal structure and x-ray diffraction, (4)electronic structure, (5)surface effects, (6)properties of semiconductors.

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5)	截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學。 1.基本電磁理論 2.介質介面的電磁波反射及穿透 3.板式波導 4.實際的波導型式   5.光介質波導內之傳播、調制及振盪 6.光纖 7.諧振盪及耦合器 8.分布回饋式元件
description.en: 1. Basic electromagnetic theory 2.Reflection and transmission of plane waves at a dielectric interface 3.The slab waveguides 4.Practical waveguide geometries 5.Optical fibers 6.Propagation, modulation, and oscillation in optical dielectric waveguide 7.Resonators and couplers 8.Distributed feedback structures

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 本課程以理論方法及案例研討方式教導學生創新的系統化思考方法，使學生學習：1. 系統化創新方法；2. 問題創意思考與解決。
description.en: The purpose of this curriculum is to teach systematic innovation thinking method by introducing theory and methodology and studying practical cases. This program makes students learn:1.	systematic innovation methods;2.	Creative problem thinking and solving.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

name.zh: 細菌生理學與生化工程

description.zh: 細菌為基因工程中最常用的寄主細胞。在生化反應器中扮演一個個小反應器，生產人類所要的產物。這個小反應器中的變化當然影嚮產物的製程。本課程即是介紹與生化工程相關之細菌生理。包含生長速率控制、嚴酷環境回應、熱休克回應、DNA修復等。
description.en: Bacterial is the most common host cell of genetic engineering. It plays a tiny reactor in bioreactor to generate our desired products. The change of this tiny reactor, physiology, has influence on the process. This course is to introduce bacterial physiology related to biotechnology. It includes growth rate control, stringent response, heat shock response, DNA repair and so on.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於強化並提昇學生在中、英文學術與專業論文寫作上的能力與表達。內容包括：1.介紹工程研究的本質及科學家的思考邏輯；2.相關文獻資料的選用與閱讀；3.研究主題的寫作計畫與大綱；4.論文格式、寫作各項要求、段落銜接、病句分析及文法修辭等；5.好文章的組成要素，譬如是否精確報導事實？如何進一步討論數據測量的是非、新舊、優劣？以及是否解決問題的重點等？6.研究計畫書及論文的評審與出版；7.其他注意事項，含如何運用電腦媒體及網路製作圖表、簡報、履歷表、求職信、推薦函以及正確且合理使用他人的著作資料等。
description.en: 1.Nature of engineering research, thinking and logic of scientists.2.Reading and understanding literature and problems in research.3.Planning process and preliminary outlines before a scientific writing.4.Style, format, writing requirements, paragraph transition, sentence coherence, and grammar rhetoric for a scientific paper.5.Key elements of a fine paper, i.e. being a precise report of facts, being a concise interpretation of measured data and their comparisons and analysis, and being a new finding or solution for a research problem.6.Submission, reviewing and publication of research proposals and papers.7.Tips on writing with the aid of computer tools and websites include the making of tables, graphs, oral presentations, resumes, and placement letters.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

name.en: Space and Culture of Digital Buildings.

description.zh: 數位化的空間設計和社會、文化理論和機能間的探討和應用。
description.en: Application of theories of social and cultural function to considerations of spatial layout and design of a particular building type.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

description.zh: 1.軟體無線電簡介 2.射頻前級 3.類比數位和數位類比轉換 4.數位硬體的選擇  5.軟體最佳化 6.專題實作
description.en: 1.Introduction to software radio2.Radio frequency front ends3.Analog to digital and digital to analog conversion4.Digital hardware choices5.Software optimization6.Implementation project

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomical design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 從性別研究的角度來看產品設計中的刻版印象，並提出創新設計的可能性
description.en: Look at the stereotypes within the products from a perspective of gender studies and come up with new ideas for creation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係協助學生進行設計意象相關主題之研究與實務專題分析，以培養各種意象理論與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the students whose topics of graduate projects are related to design image to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case analysis, and its contents contain image of material, image of shape, image of content, to establish the ability about theory of image and analysis method.

name.zh: 空間設計形式構成研究

description.zh: 從文化與歷史的觀點，看空間形式生成的歷程；從前人創作的結果，探究形式設計的創新門徑。本課程以人類生活空間包含器物、室內空間、建築外部、公共景觀設施等所呈現的各種形式構成為研究目標，回溯既往，以為創新。
description.en: To learn from the past, to build innovative creation on historical heritage, the course analyses aesthetic components from existing masterpieces in order to inspire ideas for innovative design work. Case studies are guided to investigate on 'form' appeared in our surrounding including interior space, furniture, architecture, infrastructure and landscape.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括(1)人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及(2)規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

name.en: A Value-Chain Analysis for Creative Industry

description.zh: 現代企業之競爭，已不再只是產品對產品之競爭，或服務對服務之競爭；現代的競爭已進入價值鏈對價值鏈的競爭。（設計）創意產業的價值鏈，可由創意、設計、產品開發、技術研發、生產製造、儲運、行銷通路、顧客服務及各項支援服務等所組成，而運作價值鏈最終目的乃是在滿足企業之利益關係者，包括顧客、員工、股東、合作夥伴、社區等的需求。本課程之目的乃在以創意產業實例，教導如何分析產業及企業之價值鏈，以瞭解價值鏈運作的基本原理，培養學生對產業界實際運作及如何提昇競爭力有完整的概念。
description.en: The competition for today's business world is no longer merely product vs product or service vs service.  Today's competitions among enterprises have become value-chain vs value-chain. A value-chain for a creative industry (e.g. design industry) consists of creativity, design, product development, R&D for new technologies, manufacture & production, inventory & logistics, marketing & distribution, customer services, and supporting services, etc.  The ultimate goal for operating a value-chain is to create values to satisfy the requirements of all stakeholders including customers, employees, stockholders/owners, partners, and community, etc. This lecture is to use real cases from creativity industry to demonstrate the analysis of a value-chain to understand the fundamentals of value-chain operations. This lecture is hopefully to provide students a better understanding of the relationship between academic knowledge and real world operations.  Through this understanding, students will learn

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.需求面管理與節約能源2.負載管理策略與成效評估3.負載監控與需量控制管理4.汽電共生及其他能源應用5.配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法

description.zh: 環境流力將考慮水理及水質之關係，其中亂流可加快污染物之稀釋，因此擴散及延散將是探討之重點。此外剪力、泥砂之傳輸、沖蝕將與本課程中詳加探討其與水質之關係。
description.en: The amount of energy required to propel an environmental fluid flow is of no concern to the investigator, where as what the fluid transports is of paramount importance; there are concerns about water quality.  And, turbulence in a natural flow is considered as rather beneficial because it dilutes contamination.  In traditional hydraulics, one is interested in pressure forces and water levels, but the application of Environmental Fluid Mechanics (EFM) to rivers places the emphasis on shear turbulence, sedimentation and erosion.  The interest is centered on understanding their role in environmental quality.

The content of this course includes the fundamentals of TRIZ, a simplified TRIZ model, contradiction analysis and matrix, pattern of evolution, the use of idle resource, increasing of ideality, and 40 principles. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

name.zh: 適應性模糊類神經控制

description.zh: 近年來，因為類神經網路和模糊邏輯系統具有universal approximation的特性，其應用到控制器設計問題中，都有不錯的結果。一般來說，類神經網路和模糊邏輯系統最主要被拿來當作非線性函數的近似器。因此適應性模糊類神經控制器的設計可分為兩大類：第一類為非直接適應性模糊類神經控制的設計方法，第二類為直接適應性模糊類神經控制的設計方法。前者是直接以類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統來近似非線性系統的非線性項(函數)，產生與真實系統近似的模型，利用此模型設計各種不同功能的控制器。顧名思義，"非直接"就是類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統不是直接用來當作控制器使用。後者是直接以類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統來當作控制器，針對非線性系統設計控制器，特別是具不確定性的非線性系統，此方法特別有效。內容包含：(1) 介紹，(2) 模糊邏輯系統，(3) 模糊類神經網路，(4) 訓練法則，(5) 穩定非直接適應性模糊類神經控制，(6) 穩定直接適應性模糊類神經控制，(7) 估測器為基礎之適應性模糊類神經控制，(8) 應用。
description.en: This course covers important concepts and topics in fuzzy logic systems and neural networks to serve as controllers with adaptive learning algorithms. description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作 ，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：工程資訊之分析與設計 ， 資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: construction management information and decision support system The introduction of construction engineer life cycle and integrate construction management system, management information system theory , the introduction of decision support system , linked information database system, material-orient information database system , integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction decision support system, the future of construction management information system and decision support system.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized.In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以企業間相關協同管理之議題為主軸，如協同設計、協同運籌、協同預測、協同規劃、及協同補貨等。課中除了其有關協同管理之發展、理論、及參考模式作有系統性研討。為有效了解協同管理之實務應用及其發展趨勢，最後會輔以產業個案研討以增加學生學習效果。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to focus the major issues, like collaborative design, collaborative logistics, collaborative forecasting, collaborative planning, and collaborative replenishment. The course will cover the development of collaborative management, theory, and reference model. For enhance the teaching effectiveness, the case study will be offered.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。

Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

name.zh: 迴歸分析理論探討與應用
name.en: The Theoretical Study on Regression Analysis and Its Applica

description.zh: 本課程引導學生深入研究"簡單線性迴歸"與"複迴歸"的理論基礎、技巧與用法、以及在企業管理上的應用。課程內容包含：（1）簡單線性迴歸；（2）迴歸模式適合性的推論；（3）利用迴歸模式的預測；（4）線性迴歸的應用；（5）迴歸模式假設條件的檢定；（6）複迴歸模式；（7）質量性獨立變數的處置；（8）共線性的探測；與（9）逐步迴歸分析法。課程中亦將對值得研究的議題及方向加以說明。
description.en: This course takes the students into the in-depth study on the "simple linear regression" and the "multiple regression" in terms of their theoretical background, techniques, and the applications in business. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Simple linear regression, (2) Inference based on fitted regression model, (3) prediction based on fitted regression model, (4) Application of simple linear regression, (5) Verification of regression assumption, (6) Multiple regression, (7) Qualitative independent variables, (8) Multicollinearity, and (9) Stepwise regression. Topics and directions warrant future researches will also be discussed in this course.

notes: 限博士生修讀【英文授課】【停開】

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何利用X-光晶體繞射方法以獲得高解析度蛋白質三維結構。課程內容包括蛋白質純化技術、晶體培養、繞射數據的收集及結構解析，並從各式各樣的結構來了解蛋白質的折疊方式、反應機制及其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce how to construct three-dimensional macromolecule structures by using X-ray diffraction method. This will include protein purification, crystallization, diffraction data collection and structure determination. This would lead to an understanding of the folding and reaction mechanisms of various proteins and its applications in biotechnology.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: 本課程目的在於幫助學生瞭解現代的投資理論與其對投資管理的應用。當您完成此課，您勢必對證券評價與投資組合管理有透徹的瞭解。您將具備基本的理論技能，使您得以瞭解現代投資學的發展，並且熟悉與投資有關的實務。本課程涵蓋下列主題：1) 投資組合概念：風險與風險規避、風險性資產與無風險性資產之間的資本分配、最適風險性投資組合。2) 資本市場均衡：資本資產定價模型、單一指數與多因子模型、套利定價理論、市場效率。3) 固定收益證券：債券價格與殖利率、債券投資組合管理。4) 權益評價模型。5) 投資組合績效評估
description.en: The goal of this course is to provide a basic understanding of modern investment theory and its application to investment management. When you finish this course, you should have a thorough understanding of security pricing and portfolio management. You will have basic theoretical skills enabling you to understand modern developments in investments and you will be familiar with investment practices. The course will cover the following areas: 1) Portfolio Theory: Risk and Risk Aversion, Capital Allocation between the Risky Asset and the Risk-Free Asset and Optimal Risky Portfolios; 2) Equilibrium in Capital Markets: Capital Asset Pricing Model, Single-Index and Multifactor Models, Arbitrage Pricing Theory and Market Efficiency; 3) Fixed-Income Securities: Bond Prices and Yields, Managing Bond Portfolios; 4) Equity Valuation Models; 5) Portfolio Performance Evaluation.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

name.zh: 人力資源發展政策與策略
name.en: Policies and Strategies of Human Resource Development

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展政策與策略之理論知識；（二）培養進行人力資源發展政策與策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展政策與策略之關係、人力資源發展策略實務模式分析、人力資源發展政策之擬定、人力資源發展策略規劃方法、各級人力之發展、高階管理人員發展、國際化人力資源發展等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the theory of human resources policies and strategies of human resource development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of policies and strategies of human resource development. Topics including the relationship between policies and strategies of human resource development, the analysis model of strategies of human resource development, the methods of policy making of human resource development, the methods of strategic plan of human resource development, manpower development, high level managers development, international human resource development.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 本課程中說明如何網路創業，並包括實際操作。
description.en: The course is teaching how to initiate a business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 本課程提供需從事實驗研究的學生有關符合統計精神的實驗設計概念，包括確認獨立變項、相依變項、無關變項，以及實驗中隨機抽樣與相關統計的方法。實驗設計包括下列相關活動：1.形成統計假設，2.決定實驗情境；3.確立所需樣本數量。
description.en: An experimental design identifies the independent, dependent, and nuisance variables and indicates the way in which the randomization and statistical aspects of an experiment are to be carried out.  It refers to a plan for assigning subjects to experimental conditions and the statistical analysis with the plan.  The design of an experiment to investigate a scientific or research hypothesis involves a number of interrelated activities: 1. Formulation of statistical hypothesis, 2. Determination of the experimental conditions to be used, and 3. Specification of the number of subjects required.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在協助學生：一、認識課程改革的相關學理，包括改革的意義改革的歷程改革的類型改革的策略等；二、檢視國內外重要的課程改革研究與文獻；三、分析國內技職教育課程改革的現況與問題。
description.en: The course is design to (a)introduce the rationale of curriculum reform, (b)analyze the reaearch papers on the curriculum reform enacted in other countries, and (c)review the present curriculum reform in the Taiwan's technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 管理決策分析課程，包含主題為企業在確定情況下的決策與不確定情況下的決策分析。此課程提供大家作出良好決策程序的研究基礎。預先對機率、統計與計量分析方法的學習對此門課程是有幫助的。此課程中會描述以決策分析模型、步驟與如何形成每個決策模型步驟介紹、及再許多實務的運用情況。
description.en: Managerial Decision-Making includes the following topics: Decision Making under Certainty;  Decision Making under Uncertainty. This course provides the basis for the comprehensive study of procedures for making good decisions. A prior course in Probability, Statistics and Quantitative Analysis Methods are useful. This course presents a step-by-step procedure for decision making known as the rational model and describes how to perform each step, in detail, and illustrate their application in a variety of situations.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對行銷管理相關議題有更深入的瞭解，包括1.服務行銷、2.關係行銷、3.品牌管理、4. 口碑行銷、5. 市場導向、6. 行銷策略、7.以及學生有興趣研究的行銷主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding marketing Management. Topics are as follows: 1. Service Marketing, 2.Relationship Marketing, 3. Brand Management, 4. Word of Mouth Marketing, 5. Market Orientation, 6. Marketing Strategy, 7. Other topics students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

name.zh: 類神經模糊控制及其應用
name.en: Neural Fuzzy Control and Its Applications

description.zh: 雖然類神經網路及模糊邏輯均可適當作為控制用，但前者具有容錯、平行處理及學習的特性，而後者具有語言描述及邏輯控制的特性，因此這兩者具有互補效果。若能將此二者妥善整合，將有助於解決複雜系統的控制問題。近年來如何充分利用類神經網路與模糊系統的好處（例如系統的強健性、資訊分散式表示法、容易處理不確定感測器數據等），並據此設計一控制系統，這方面的需求日益迫切。這門課在歐美先進國家很熱門，國內雖有一些大學，開始開授類神經網路，以及模糊系統的課程，但大都單獨開授，僅有少數將此二者予以整合。有鑑於此，乃選擇開授「類神經模糊控制及其應用」。授課對象以研究生為主，時間為一學期。本課程開授的目的為介紹類神經網路與模糊控制之基本理論、重要現象、分析方法與工具、及部份應用實例。另外也將介紹相關研究課題之發展、研究近況與待探討的問題。規劃的課程大綱如下：類神經網路簡介、前饋網路及監督式學習、非監督式學習網路、迴授型類神經網路、類神經網路之應用、模糊集合概念、模糊關係、模糊邏輯及近似推理、模糊邏輯控制系統及類神經模糊控制器。
description.en: Neural networks and fuzzy systems have demonstrated good characteristics, such as robustness, distributed knowledge representation, capable of handling uncertainties, etc. In this course, we shall introduce the basic theorems, important phenomena, analysis methods and tools, and some applications. Besides, we shall also introduce some recent development in research, new research topics, and some unsolved problems. The outline of this course is as follows. Introduction to Neural Networks, Feedforward networks and Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, Applications of Neural Networks, Concept of Fuzzy Sets, Fuzzy Relations, Fuzzy Logic and Approximate Reasoning, Fuzzy Logic Control and Neural Fuzzy Controllers.
